links.*: The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition

wikitext.*:
[[Image:There's magic in The Hobbit.jpg|thumb]]

'''There's magic in The Hobbit''' is [[Houghton Mifflin]]'s full-page advertisement for [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Hobbit]]'', printed in the [[26 March|March 26]], [[1938]], issue of ''Publishers Weekly''.<ref>[[Douglas A. Anderson|Anderson, Douglas A.]]: ''[[The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition]]''</ref>
